It has been an year already!

Posted by Sandeep Raju on September 27, 2015

It’s been almost an year already (well, 342 days to be exact) since I wrote anything here. A lot of it had to do with laziness and procastination rather than being busy and all that ;)

But then, in life, you make this constant effort to improve - “be the better you”. Being on such a journey of late, I have started to get back to writing.

As always, no promises on being regular but I’ll be writing more, and on a lot more diverse topics that I used to! But, before all that; what was I upto all this while? I have a lot to say about it, but then I thought why bore people to death with it and came up with this tiny list:

  • Talk at PyCon India 2014 - Yeah, this was long due and it was fun presenting my work to a bunch of geeks.
  • Release of SHARQ - A long time dream to author and open source project finally came true.
  • The himalayan winter trek with friends - Yet another fun trip with the Sanchaara team.
  • Meeting Dave Cheney, William Kennedy and BG at GopherCon India - Some raw inspiration interacting with them.
  • Building yn (wine) with SK at AngelHack 2015 - Thought the hack finally didn’t see the light of the day, it was awesome fun as ususal working with Shrikrishna after a long time.
  • Mentoring Interns at Plivo - Great fun interacting and mentoring the interns. Learnt a lot in the process which will help me in the days to come.
  • Quitting my first job at Plivo - It’s hard to leave what you love the most, but then life had more interesting adventures up its sleeve.
  • Buildiing Strawberry Stack with team Lambda at Sequoia Hack 2015 - As always, it is fun hacking with SK, P G and Sujay.
  • Getting into Northwestern University - Here I am, right now, at the start of my next adventure in this journey!

It has been great so far (of course with a fair mix of ups and downs) and I am really excited to see what lies ahead for me.
